charges.charge_disposition: AMENDED ORDER filed on 11/26/08 granting reduction of sentenced. Sentence of imprisonment of LIFE is reduced to 292 Months with credit for time served. If the reduced sentenced is less than the amount of time the defendant already served, then his sentence shall be reduced to time served. During the period of supervised release, the defendant is subject to placement in a Residential Re-Entry Center (half-way house) for a period not to exceed 180 days at the discretion of the U.S. Probation Office. The Court further orders that pursuant to United States Guidelines 5G1.3 and the Application Notes, the defendant's term of incarceration shall be adjusted to include (and give the defendant credit for) the following periods of time during which he was held: 2/22/90 to 3/2/90; 3/16/90 to 8/30/90 and 5/22/91 to present. Except as provided above, all provisions of the judgment dated 11/23/93 shall remain in effect. Resentenced; defendant's sentence is reduced pursuant to 18:3582(c)(2): Two Hundred Ninety-Two (292) months incarceration, with credit for time served, followed by Five (5) years supervised release; sentence to run concurrently with reduced sentence for Counts 3rs, 93rs, and 94rs.
